subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Suits and Litigation
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong was hit with two more lawsuits on Thursday, including one by an insurance company that paid him $3 million in bonuses for his first three Tour victories.
snippet: Lance Armstrong was hit with two more lawsuits on Thursday, including one by an insurance company that paid him $3 million in bonuses for his first three Tour victories.
